actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat the noncash remuneration paid to certain workers on fishing boats as self-employment income.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code, that the noncash remuneration of specified workers on fishing boats shall be treated as self-employment income. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 312(b))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat the noncash remuneration paid to certain workers on fishing boats as self-employment income.
